subject: Re: Kodilo - Weekly Update
preview: Hi Sarah,  No problem at all, thank you so much for trusting us!  Let me know if there’s anything else you need, always happy to help.

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah,

No problem at all, thank you so much for trusting us!

Let me know if there’s anything else you need, always happy to help.

Excellent thanks

Sarah Fairweather

General Manager

08 6217 0600

|

1800 800 919

| F 08 6217 0699

15 Mumford Place, Balcatta WA 6021
Thanks - okay to track time and close this ticket.

Hi Sarah!

Hope your day’s going well - and thank you for letting us know!

Just a quick update on Andy’s behalf - we looked into the issue with the FLEX Basin Mixer codes, and it turns out there was a bug causing all colour finishes to show the same product code.

Here is an update:
  • Each colour finishes now displays its correct product code
  • If anything still looks off, just let us know and we’ll take another look

Appreciate you letting us know, always happy to help!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hey @andy - confirming we have fixed the product code issue 🙏


Links: https://kodilo.com.au/product/alder-flex-basin-mixer-extended/

@here - can we review this product codes item?

Thank you

Hi Andy

I'll review and loop back next week.

For now I am told the product codes are not working - shows the same code
for colour finishes

FLEX Basin Mixer was the complaint

Can you pleas review

Thanks

Sarah

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 28 July 2025 9:58 AM
To: Sarah Fairweather <sfairweather@aldertapware.com.au>
Cc: allie@wolfiq.com.au <allie@wolfiq.com.au>; Kosta Galanis <
kosta@pointdot.com.au>
Subject: Re: Kodilo - Weekly Update

Hi Sarah,

Hope you had a good weekend.

We're making good progress on website conversion from insights of user
behavior on the site.

Site monetization is still low but improving week on week in revenue,
purchases and revenue per visitor.

I've outlined 5 more recommendations in this short video here to improve
conversions. Let us know if we can proceed.

*Kodilo Proposed Updates | Jul 28* - Watch Video
<https://www.loom.com/share/041ba2ebbb1a43b4adccf3e1d6ec20fe>
<https://www.loom.com/share/041ba2ebbb1a43b4adccf3e1d6ec20fe?utm_medium=gif>

Thank you,
Andy
closing this now, as we'll wait for client update 🙏

Hi Sarah,

Thanks so much for sharing the feedback.

Here’s what we’ve actioned so far:
  1. Warranty & Assurance section: Updated per your notes. We’ve also made this a custom post type, so it can be easily managed from the dashboard.
  2. Additional Information section: Now editable via the dashboard as well. We've added the WELS info (5 star 6L/min, WELS Reg No: T43518) as shown in your notes.
  3. You can view the changes here: https://kodilo.com.au/product/surge-sink-mixer/

What we’re still waiting on:
  1. For the key features, we’ve prepped the layout and just need the final list of features you'd like to include.
  2. For the watermark image, could you kindly send that through when you get a chance?

We’ll jump back in as soon as those are in hand - thanks again for your help!

• done updating the warranty and assurance section. i made a custom post type so that it can be changed manually from the dashboard.

  • done updating the additional information section. we need to get the details for other products because this is added manually on the dashboard.

  • for this section, may we ask the client to send us the watermark

(Time:60mins)

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi all

Feedback on changes required for the product page design please - see attached

Thanks

Sarah

Sarah Fairweather

General Manager

| F 08 6217 0699

15 Mumford Place, Balcatta WA 6021

Thanks, Sarah.

When you get a chance, please review and approve the new product page layout. Once approved, we'll push it live.

After that, we'll start rolling the layout out across the remaining category pages. That part will take more time as it requires some manual implementation per page.

Appreciate your help as always.

Cheers,
Andy

Thanks for the update Andy. Looking forward to dialing up the conversions!!

Thanks all

Sarah

Sarah Fairweather

General Manager

P

|

FREECALL
1800 800 919

| F 08 6217 0699

15 Mumford Place, Balcatta WA 6021

Hi Sarah,

Happy Friday!

Here's a quick update on what's been completed and what's underway.

We're making good progress on the site improvements and expect July will show much better results on conversion.

Let us know if you'd like to run through anything together.

Thanks,
Andy

****

Completed This Week
1. Product Pages
  • Full redesign now complete
  • Updates include:
    • New tabbed layout for "Additional Info," "Downloads," and "Warranty & Assurance"
    • Mobile-friendly redesign of key features (e.g., Free Delivery, Lowest Price Guaranteed)
    • Updated testimonials section for consistency site-wide
    • Live example: Surge Sink Mixer
2. Homepage + Shop Updates
  • Layouts refined and centered for a more polished look
  • Navigation, newsletter, and inquiries sections cleaned up
  • Subtle hover effects added to improve UX
  • Preview links Homepage
3. Performance
  • Canonical indexing issue resolved

4. Discount Code ($20)
  • Removed from all pages requested
  • Confirmed that the "WELCOME20" code now works once per customer regardless of cart value or capitalisation
5. Promoted Products
  • Two new products have been added to the top of the SALE page as requested
6. Monthly Reports
  • We've now added you as a recipient for the monthly Care Plan reports (previously only sent to Dimitri).
  • Attached is the June website report for your review.
****

--

Andy Crebar

Director
0480 801 428
andy@wolfiq.com
